resources.string: In addition to unlocking your phone, you can also use your fingerprint to authorize purchases and app access.
Screen lock option disabled. You can still use your fingerprint to authorize purchases and app access.
Locate the fingerprint sensor below the screen.

Just touch the fingerprint sensor to unlock your phone, authorize purchases, or sign in to apps. Be careful whose fingerprints you add. Even one added print can do any of these things.\n\nNote: Your fingerprint may be less secure than a strong pattern, PIN, or password. Learn more
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the back of the screen.
